#summary select one (and only one) from a list of choices

= Introduction =

A single select control.
Multiple options are provided, only one may be selected.


= Details =

Typically implemented as a [select list] or [radio buttons]
Use [checkboxes] or [multiple select lists] when more than one choice may be selected.
